      @NotNull public static <T> String toString(@NotNull T[] array, @NotNull String delimeter, @Nullable Function<T,String> mapper)
      Formats an array to a string representation with an optional function to modify each array object, otherwise normal Java toString() will be used.
      Type Parameters:
      T - Type of array
      Parameters:
      array - Array to format
      delimeter - String to separate individual objects in array
      mapper - Optional
